name: Headball (Le Codex)
description:
A second game, done a bit quicker, in the same minimalist artstyle.

ZQSD to move the red, Arrow keys to move the blue.

Push the green ball to the opposite goal.

If the ball touches a wall, it bounces on it.

If the ball touches the little white square, it gains a 10-second bonus between:

Being tinier, being faster (brighter).

The match has a duration of 100 second (1 min 40), reprensented by the middle green rectangle.

Have fun!
